entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2024-06-05
entry.content:
WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.6-experimental1

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.6-experimental1 is available. 1.6-experimental1 is an experimental release for the WinAppSDK that includes bug fixes for 1.5, access to non-stable APIs, and new features including AOT support, improved TabView tab tear-out, and a new TitleBar control.

Check out our release notes for the list of fixed issues and new or experimental APIs in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.6-experimental1 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.6.240531000-experimental1.
